name: person/guide_outcasts
dialog: The infamous quarter of the Outcasts is under the jurisdiction of the Camira Great House. The residential buildings are not centralized and the quality of the housing in general is... ahem... pretty basic. At least the crime rates are lower than in the slums.

Nevertheless, there are several reasons to rent a place here. First, and most importantly, it''s hard to find something more affordable. Rent is cheap and affordable. Secondly, in contrast to the Serpentine quarter, houses are spacious.
